game.name: Summer Paws
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Summer days, warm rain, magical nights! Sleeping kittens are hidden well. Can you find them?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Summer days, warm rain, magical nights! Sleeping kittens are hidden well. Can you find them?

reviewHighlights.text: nice 3d hidden object game with lots of levels. but the game doesnt do the best job of explaining you need to find the sleeping cats, rather than any...
